name: zefiel
text: Cornelius is Old-School enough to not do any drug other than Absynthe.

name: peppermint
text: Not a chance in hell. Cornelius is a laudanum man.

name: zefiel
text: A comment left by zefiel was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by madnes, DeimosRising, mortshire, mat4900)

name: tonyhighwind
text: I had to look that shit up to find out how right you are.  A chubby and a golf clap for you.

name: the_stoned_one
text: Well he toked when he joined Stoned Lightning

name: untilyouaresonude
text: Mr. Bear doesn't want anything to do with fuckin' Christo or his fuckin' shit.

name: greyfield
text: Does anyone? I mean, really? By my account, Christo is a lesser work of Christo.

name: iorek
text: A comment left by iorek was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by divot, Jesler729, aquamuffin, ford, Mastronaut, Darthemed)

name: tekende
text:
BAMF? Big...Asshole...Mother Fucker?

Well, I don't know!

name: cpnglxynchos
text: MR. BEAR IS ONE BAD ASS MOTHER FUCKER

name: heccibiggs
text:
[IMGS OFF]

?

name: cagliostro
text:
Yeah, that's all 'BAMF' will ever mean to me. It's like if 'SNIKT' became an Internet acronym.

Thank Christ they didn't make Nightcrawler's teleport effect 'MILF', things could have got really awkward.

name: shutup_shutup
text:
"Suddenly Now I Know Things"
"Sorta nerdy, Into Knife Throwing"
"Saddam Never Imagined Kurdish Talabani"
etc.

name: shutup_shutup
text: Oh, also, "Saddam Necessitated Invented Nuclear Threat"

name: heccibiggs
text: That would be SNINT.

name: shutup_shutup
text: Damn but you are right! Stupid N.

name: jrpigman
text:
I wonder what Ray's cologne smells like...

I bet it's like Brut and Astroglide.

name: jackparsons
text: Magnum - straight from the magazine. Or 'vas in a pinch.

name: nonemorenegative
text:
Are we back to Ray being neutered again !? Can't imagine it'd smell very alluring, anyrate.

(this is a joke)

name: tekende
text: A diaper filled with Indian food.

name: crinklebat
text: I need to use that last line.

name: nytyper
text: I've used the "Lesser works of Christo" line more than once.

name: tripperday
text: The "lesser works of Christo" is a term that can be applied to a lot of yards in my neighborhood.

name: nsrdude
text: Beef still looks determined but angry. I love the look of bewilderment on Cornelius's face in panel 3

name: luckypyjamas
text:
in my high school art history class, i did a presentation about how much christo sucks.

i even had a demonstration, wherein i had two of my friends drape a sheet over a wooden drawing horse.

name: professorhazard
text: You're not alone. In researching Christo, I discovered that the only cool thing he ever did was build a giant wall of oil drums.

name: luckypyjamas
text:
you know, i had thought that some of the early stuff was alright

i just have to wonder how many times you can put tarps or burlap sacks on top of something and still consider it new and interesting

christo = Bull Shit

name: kelsotimebomb
text:
Yeah, see, I'm not so much a fan of his (and his wife's) wrapping stuff up.

But I gotta admit, I thought the umbrellas were pretty tight.

name: tim_simmons
text: given the length of the strips preceding this one, the relative shortness of this one makes it even more funny.

name: xiaomimi
text:
Today's Blogs

Philippe: Poem!
Lyle: fn paid for poetry

name: doc_rostov
text: This whole "Onstad Pays Poetic People" saga is seriously top notch. As they'd perhaps say on eBay: "A   mad quick $ervice woud read again!"

name: doc_rostov
text:
Oh bugger. I forgot Assetbar doesn't allow plus signs.

Pretend that's an A plus plus, guys.

name: echidnaboy
text:
The young otter writes
Highly competent haiku
Accidentally

name: i_love_kate
text: If I'm being serviced, I actually prefer it not to be mad quick. Thank you very much.

name: spectre
text: "...lesser works of Christo" -- this is my ALL TIME FAVORITE Achewood line.

name: kelissamunz
text: Connie brought his SASS PANTS today.

name: tabrum1
text: You know, I own a Volvo myself, and I have to say they are a pretty fly place to be a stoned nincompoop. And also they can cause much despair when they break down...

name: fablesandblues
text:
[IMGS OFF]

I had to see what it looked like. Stupid. The answer is stupid.

name: fattypneumonia
text:
"Just don't look! Just don't look!"

(guarantee void in Tennessee)
